name: Pick Your Poison (itch) (Turtleshell Interactive)
description:
In this fast-paced FPS, everytime you kill an enemy, you have to choose a card. The effects of the card can vary from giving you a rocket launcher, to making you jump really high. Kill as many enemies as you can before you inevitably die to gain a high score! Made for the SURVIVE game jam in 3 days.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Number keys to switch weapons
  • Space to jump
  • Left Click to shoot
